definition: Kunshan county level city in Suzhou 蘇州|苏州[Su1 zhou1], Jiangsu
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The Kuilei Lake is the main drinking water supply source of the Kunshan city.
sentences.chinese: 傀儡湖是崑山市最主要的飲用水源。
崑山市國民經濟保持平穩增長。

sentences.english: We just bought a new apartment in Kunshang city, Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 我倆剛在江蘇省，崑山市買了一個公寓。

sentences.english: This paper will offer referrences to guarantee security of drinking water in Kunshan.
sentences.chinese: 本文可爲保障崑山市飲用水水源地安全提供參考。
